Entries.Neutral_2: Taking a break? That's good. I don't want you overexerting yourself.
Entries.Neutral_7: I feel a bit run-down today. Maybe I'll just take it easy.
Entries.spring_3: Ah, spring. Birds singing, flowers blooming, and young men's fancy turning...$h#$e#Maybe I should wait until tonight to finish that thought.$l
Entries.spring_13: I wonder who will win the egg hunt today? Abigail seems hard to beat.
Entries.spring_19: You still need regular check-ups, even though you're married to a doctor.#$e#You'll be healthier and I'll get to enjoy your visits to the clinic.$h
Entries.spring_24: I'm running over the Flower Dance steps in my mind. I don't want to forget them once the music starts.
Entries.summer_8: Fewer people get sick during the summer, but accident rates increase. Be careful out there, dear.
Entries.summer_11: I always overeat at the luau. I can't help myself. Gus's food is so good!$h
Entries.summer_19: In medical school, we used to talk about what our ideal practice would look like.#$e#Most of the other students wanted money, famous clients, prestigious awards...#$e#I don't know if they ever got what they wanted, but I did!$h#$e#
Entries.summer_28: Can we watch the jellies together tonight, @?#$e#They'll be even lovelier reflected in your eyes.$l
Entries.fall_9: It would be nice to take a vacation together. Somewhere interesting. Exotic.#$e#Low to the ground.$s#$e#I'm still working on my fear of heights.$h
Entries.fall_16: It's Fair day!$h#$e#I enjoy seeing all of our friends' hard work on display.
Entries.fall_27: Spirit's Eve...$s#$e#Stay close to me tonight, will you, dear?$l
Entries.winter_8: Be sure to bundle up warmly for the festival today. What do you think of having some mulled wine when we get home afterwards?
Entries.winter_9: I'm tired today.$s#$e#We shouldn't have stayed up so late last night...$l
Entries.winter_14: Any special plans for today?#$e#It's cold out there, I know...$s#$e#Perhaps we can find something to do indoors.$l
Entries.winter_22: There are some people in town whose health really worries me.$s#$e#But I can't talk about their problems with anyone, not even you. That wouldn't be right.$s#$e#It's hard sometimes...$s
Entries.winter_25: Did you find a gift for your secret friend? I spent hours trying to decide on one for mine.

Entries.111111111/f Harvey 2990/t 0900 1500: sappypiano/7 7/farmer 6 12 0 Harvey 6 6 2/skippable/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 -1 0/speak Harvey "Hello, dear. Need anything?"/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Harvey "Oh, I was just wondering what we should do with this apartment. Do you know anyone in town who might want to live here?"/pause 200/faceDirection Harvey 1/speak Harvey "It's a comfortable little place. I wish I had better memories of it.$s"/faceDirection Harvey 2/pause 200/move farmer 0 -3 0/emote farmer 28/pause 200/speak Harvey "I wouldn't call them bad memories. It's just..."/move Harvey 2 0 2/move Harvey 0 2 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Harvey "So often, I would come back here after a long day at the clinic."/pause 200/faceDirection Harvey 1/speak Harvey "I'd make a quick but unhealthy microwave dinner. Alone.$s"/pause 200/faceDirection Harvey 3/speak Harvey "I'd sit and eat and try to forget my stressful day. Alone.$s"/pause 200/faceDirection Harvey 0/speak Harvey "I'd spend a few hours reading, or monitoring the radio, wishing I had someone to talk to.$s"/pause 200/faceDirection Harvey 3/speak Harvey "Then I'd usually go to bed early. Alone, of course.$s"/pause 200/emote Harvey 40/faceDirection Harvey 3/speak Harvey "I'm so glad you rescued me, @.$l"/move farmer 1 0 1/emote farmer 20/pause 100/showFrame Harvey 31/positionOffset Harvey 0 20/positionOffset farmer 15 0/showFrame 101/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
